name: Mardon
description: Mardon app with typescript + express.js + typeorm

scripts.auth:production: cd ./authorization && npm run build && cp ./.env ./dist/authorization && cd ./dist/authorization && pm2 start main.js --name 'authorization' -- start
scripts.banners:production: cd ./banners && npm run build && cp ./.env ./dist/banners && cd ./dist/banners && pm2 start main.js --name 'banners' -- start
scripts.catelog:production: cd ./catalog && npm run build && cp ./.env ./dist/catalog && cd ./dist/catalog && pm2 start main.js --name 'catalog' -- start
scripts.images:production: cd ./images && npm run build && cp ./.env ./dist/images && cd ./dist/images && pm2 start main.js --name 'images' -- start
scripts.mailer:production: cd ./mailer && npm run build && cp ./.env ./dist/mailer && cd ./dist/mailer && pm2 start main.js --name 'mailer' -- start
scripts.news:production: cd ./news && npm run build && cp ./.env ./dist/news && cd ./dist/news && pm2 start main.js --name 'news' -- start
scripts.orders:production: cd ./orders && npm run build && cp ./.env ./dist/orders && cd ./dist/orders && pm2 start main.js --name 'orders' -- start
scripts.questions:production: cd ./questions && npm run build && cp ./.env ./dist/questions && cd ./dist/questions && pm2 start main.js --name 'questions' -- start
scripts.reviews:production: cd ./reviews && npm run build && cp ./.env ./dist/reviews && cd ./dist/reviews && pm2 start main.js --name 'reviews' -- start
scripts.swagger:production: cd ./swagger && npm run build && cp ./.env ./dist/swagger && cd ./dist/swagger && pm2 start main.js --name 'swagger' -- start
scripts.wishlists:production: cd ./wishlists && npm run build && cp ./.env ./dist/wishlists && cd ./dist/wishlists && pm2 start main.js --name 'wishlists' -- start
scripts.dev:server: npm-run-all --parallel auth:dev banners:dev catalog:dev gateway:start images:dev orders:dev questions:dev reviews:dev wishlists:dev mailer:dev news:dev
scripts.pm2-start: npm-run-all --sequential gateway:production auth:production banners:production catelog:production images:production mailer:production news:production orders:production questions:production reviews:production swagger:production wishlists:production
